headline: Unpacking Q4 Earnings: 3M (NYSE:MMM) In The Context Of Other General Industrial Machinery Stocks
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how 3M (NYSE:MMM) and the rest of the general industrial machinery stocks fared in Q4.

headline: This Top Dividend ETF Is Making Some Major Changes
summary: The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF (NYSEMKT: SCHD) is one of the largest exchange-traded funds (ETFs) focused on dividend stocks.  The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF doesn't just invest in any dividend stock.  It focuses on companies with the highest-quality payouts.
